name: Keepin' Time
description:
The Blue Clock in Hanley has broken down, and it's your job as the Repair Robot to go inside the clock and fix it! 

Run around the clock (using the W A S D keys) to pick up parts, which you can use to keep the mechanisms inside the clock repaired (using the E key). If all 3 mechanisms break, its Game Over - so see how long you can last! 

Team NoName - 

Edward Barton
James Parker-Rees
Joe Hutchinson
Luca Tarantino
